text: Major General Matheus Alueendo ( born in 04 March 1961) is a Namibian military officer who is the current Commander of the Namibian Army (NA). He was appointed the Commander of the Namibian Army on 31 July 2019.http://www.mod.gov.na/ac- speechhttps://www.lelamobile.com/content/81207/Alueendo-takes-over-Shalauda- retires-as-Army- Commander/http://nampa.org/index.php?model=feature&function;=display&id;=153710https://www.namibian.com.na/81616/read/Alueendo- takes-over-as-army-commander ==Career== General Alueendo military career began in 1978 when he joined PLAN in exile participating in the liberation struggle,we was repatriated to Namibia and began his career in the Namibian Army in July 1990 after being commissioned as a lieutenant rising through the ranks and was promoted to Colonel in 2010. General Alueendo is a Military Intelligence officer who has served in various roles within the directorate including as Chief of Staff Defence Intelligence from November 2013. In September 2018 he was appointed as the Deputy Namibian Army Commander. ===Qualifications=== *2003: Post graduate military qualification ('psc'), Indian Defence Services Command and Staff Course. *2003: Masters of Military Science Degree in Defence and Strategic Studies (MSc) Madras University, India. *2009: Masters of Arts in Strategic and Security Studies (MASSS), University of Namibia. *2014: Advance Military Diploma,Academy of General Staff, Russia. *2016: Advance post graduate military qualification ('ndc') India National Defence College, India. *2018: Masters of Philosophy Degree Strategic Studies, Madras University, India. ==Honours and Decorations== * x18px NDF Campaign Medal *NDF 10 years service medal * x20px UNMIL Peacekeeping medalhttp://www.mod.gov.na/documents/264813/286599/Biograph+of+Maj+Gen+Alueendo.pdf/5c488dda-362f-4ca5-99bd-c3e2cb2d2251 * x20px UNMIL Peacekeeping medal * x18px Namibian Army Pioneer Medal * x18px Army Ten Years Service Medal * x18px Army Twenty Years Service Medal * x18px NDF Commendation Medal ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Namibian military personnel
title: Matheus Alueendo
